product_name: Merrell All Out Blaze Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: The women's waterproof Merrell All Out Blaze Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots are built to allow natural motion and absorb impacts so your feet stay comfortable mile after mile on your day hikes. Waterproof, seam-sealed construction offers a high level of breathability. Breathable mesh linings are treated with M-Select FRESH natural enzymes to help prevent odors. Lacing system provides a precise, glovelike fit. Bellowed tongues keep debris out. Merrell AllOut Blaze Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots have Vibram(R) outsoles with 6mm-deep lugs for excellent traction on the trail.
short_description: The women's waterproof Merrell All Out Blaze Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots are built to allow natural motion and absorb impacts so your feet stay comfortable mile after mile on your day hikes.
